import Head from "next/head"; import client from '../../client' import Image from "react-bootstrap/Image"; const ProductDetails = (props) => { return (

Description

A beautiful handbag made from leather with gold detailing

Shipping

Complimentary ground shipping on all domestic orders. Returns accepted within 7 days of delivery on full price items. All sale items and masks are final sale. International shipping available to select countries.

); }; ProductDetails.getInitialProps = async function (context) { const {slug = " "} = context.query return await client.fetch(` *[_type == "product" && slug.current == $slug][0] `, { slug }) } export default ProductDetails;
